lines.text: This is the test setup for GOduino II
lines.text_raw: This is the test setup for GOduino II

guide.summary: This is a low-cost  (< $20) Arduino (ATmega328) based robot brain that controls motor speed and direction using through-hole parts for serviceability.
guide.title: GOduino II = Arduino + L293D Variable Speed Motor Controller
